Name: Dolores
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Aromatic and well balanced, provided you use French-made Dubonnet.
History: A classic. Some recipes include a splash of orange juice.
